Security Officer

Company: Alstom
Location: Saharanpur, Uttar Pradesh, India
LinkedIn post
Protection of Alstom employees, sites, assets, as well as sensitive information .

  • Assess the threat and identify the security risks for the site,
  • Ensure compliance of any security measure implemented within the site with the Group Security policies,
  • Define and implement the relevant security measures for the site,
  • Define and implement the right security organization for the site,
  • Control and update (depending on the risks) the site security organization, means and processes,
  • Edit and update the Site Security Plan
  • Follow both the general security and social situation in the site city / vicinity,
  • Provide advice and recommendations to the Site MD on security issues and ensure coordination with all security stakeholders (external and internal),
  • Create and maintain the relevant local security network (security providers, security managers from other sites / companies, local public authorities, local police…)
  • Manage security awareness and ensure security knowledge of site employees,
  • Report all security incidents to the Site MD and the Reporting Security Manager (depending on the country security organization). Ensure that all appropriate measures are taken in liaison with the police / judicial services,
  • Contribute to the security providers selection (in liaison with sourcing),
  • Manage and follow-up of the security providers service on site,
  • At site level, implement rules to ensure economic security and to protect sensitive information,
  • Anticipate and prepare all planned events on the site in liaison with internal stakeholders and public authorities/security forces (such as open days, public receptions…)
  • Anticipate and prepare VIP visits on site in liaison with internal stakeholders and public authorities/security forces,
  • Implement crisis management procedures at site level, according to the Group Security Policy
  • Basic Qualifications.
  • Graduate Degree.
  • Advanced knowledge about local / national security environment; field experience in the country
  • Crisis management ability,
  • Experience in drafting security plans,
  • Ability to adapt to constant change, to manage multiple tasks and to deal with complex, stressful situations,
  • Good spoken, written and synthesizing skills,
  • Confidentiality sensitivity
  • Strong interpersonal and communications skills (ability to effectively communicate within all levels of the site and outside the site).
  • Analytical and problem-solving skills to implement/review adequate security measures
  • Experience in organizing and managing staff/teamwork

In this frame, the Site Security Officer receives delegation from the site MD to implement and oversees Alstom security policies and procedures at site level. He/she is in charge of protecting Alstom people (employees and visitors), assets, sensitive information and of implementing crisis management processes in liaison with all relevant internal and external stakeholders.
